phrases: You are here to look for that clock part, too?!
I believe this is our first time meeting.
Shall I introduce myself?
I am Samuel.
You are that Exceed Natsu and the others were talking about!
That is right.
I am usually referred to as the brains of Legion.
This is the clock part?
It is bigger than I thought it would be...
If we do not find some way to get it out of here...
Hey!
Still got fight left in you?!
No.
I have lost completely.
I manfully acknowledge my defeat.
So now will you tell us about Legion's goal?
Yeah!
Like what that clock is and the reason you are collecting the parts...
We would appreciate an explanation.
Alright, already!
At this point, I might as well give in and tell you everything!
Alright, I will fill you in on who I am and what my aim is.
Let us begin!
Why with a picture-story?
Something Beyond Reckoning!
I, Dan Straight, was born in a town called Cedar.
They had knights there that protected the town and the church.
People depended on them.
The people in my family were knights for generation after generation.
As the successor in my family, I was raised with tender care and affection,
and had a happy childhood.
However, those peaceful days did not last long.
At one point, a civil war flared up that split the town in half.
You have a surprisingly hard past...
Then your family became embroiled in the battle too and suffered...
No.
The battle was over after half a day and none of my kin were harmed.
Everybody in town quickly patched things up, too.
That was fast!
Was not it more of just a fight than civil war?
But now I am getting to the main point!
At the time, there was a beautiful girl who went to my school
and I fell in love with her, my first love.
However, after the battle was over, that girl was missing!
Missing?
Then she was caught up in the battle...
Did she lose her life that day...?
That girl bore a slight resemblance to Lu-nyan.
It is so sad!
So that is why you fell in love with Lucy at first sight, huh?
You can never understand a person's situation until you hear about it, you know?
So what happened to the girl?
The next day...
I found her and she was fine!
What is that?!
I would whisper of love to her and ask her hand in marriage nearly every day,
but it seems she was frightened by how happy that made her.
I am sure she thought, I am not worthy of Dan-san's love.
I was charmed by that modesty, too.
The pictures do not really seem to match the story...
She obviously did not like him.
Ultimately, she refused marriage, and I she would tears for three days and nights.
Then, to assuage my sorrow, I embarked on a sentimental journey.
During my wanderings, I happened across various women.
They are all different types, huh?
You were not chasing the image of the first girl you fell in love with?
No, that was not it at all!
To be honest, I would be happy with any woman in the vicinity who caught my eye.
That offends me for some reason...
And yet, no matter who she was, there was a compelling reason
why we could not be together.
Love and peace are not permitted.
That is the fate of a knight who lives to fight.
Again, the story and pictures do not match up.
I bet they all turned him down.
That makes me think, who drew these pictures?
Hughes and Sugar Boy drew them based on my diary and photos.
They relied on guesswork to fill in the blanks, so the truth is mixed in with something else.
I am positive the drawings are a better representative of what really happened.
And somewhere along the line, I became a Legionnaire.
Right now, I am following Byro-sama's instructions to gather the parts of the clock.
The end!
I explained who I am and what I am after!
And they all lived happily ever after!
Um...
What we want to know
is what Legion is and what Legion is after!
I cannot talk about Legion's secrets!
If I did that, Byro-sama would punish me!
Then what was that story of yours?!
And on top of that, it turned out he has a humdrum past...
Of course, I was talking about myself so you would get to know me better!
Now let us get married, Lu-nyan!
Lu-nyan!
Yeesh.
I have so had enough of him...
What should we do, Natsu-nii?
There is no point in hanging out with the likes of him.
Lu-nyan!
Get away from me!
But we cannot leave yet.
Let us get married!
Never!
Lu-nyan!
We promised to rendezvous with the other members of the guild here.
Lu-nyan, come on!
Oh, well.
Guess there is nothing to do but wait.
Do not just wait there, help me!
Huh?
What happened to the other Legionnaire?
You mean Coco!
Maybe she got hurt again somewhere...
More likely she escaped.
There is no need to worry about her.
She is the enemy.
But I think that girl is kind and sincere at heart.
That is the same as me!
Stay away from me!
Wait for me!
If possible, I do not want to hurt her...
Get away!
Let us get married!
What are you saying, Coco?!
You are a Legionnaire, so you have got to carry out your mission!
If you want to fight, just bring it on, Sammy!
Do not take it upon yourself to abbreviate my name.
It is Samuel.
I will take care of him.
The rest of you find that clock part as soon as possible.
Panther Lily...
You are an Exceed, older than me.
I suppose you are like a big brother figure to me.
You got no reason to call me your big brother!
Do not be so cold.
As fellow Exceeds, we should be friends, do not you think...
Nii-san?
You tryin' to bug me, Sammy?!
Gajeel, Lily's right!
Let us hurry and dig up that part!
Yeah, alright... but you better not lose!
I know about you.
Even though you are an Exceed, you supported the humans
and went through hell because of it.
It was based on faith.
I do not think it was a mistake.
It seems you are not favored by nature.
You should face things in a more clever manner.
Like me...
Unfortunately, I am not made to reckon profits and losses, and then act accordingly.
I see.
Nii-san, it appears that you and I...
Now you are talking...
Here I come!
Brains are not my only strong point!
But I will show you what I mean!
What is this?!
Ruins with weird faces...
Tryin' to get away?!
Stay here an' face me fair and square!
Clashing with each other directly is what slow-witted beings so.
The clever ones think of strategy, the process, and results before fighting!
We Legionnaires have performed rigorous ascetic exercises that you could not even imagine, Nii-san,
We are trained to deal with every type of situation!
What?!
This is all working out according to my calculations.
I impress myself!
According to my calculations, you have fallen somewhere around here.
I am right here, Sammy!
You are a tenacious cat, Nii-san.
You will not be able to get me with the same trick twice!
Gajeel and them are probably about to dig up that part any second now!
You have no chance!
I do not know about that.
These ruins are mined with various traps.
Traps?!
What the hell?
I do not see anything that could be part of a clock.
Hey, somethin's written on here.
Um...
It says, I am hungry.
Hey!
Here.
Is not this like the face of a clock?
Then... it is indicating snack time?
That is it!
So we just got to move this, right?
I told you I have got more going for me than smarts alone!
I study various forms of martial arts like this, too!
Gajeel...
Be careful!
We finally found it!
It is a clock face!
What are you doing?!
This thing's made of iron.
Is not there any other way you could have figured that out?
Something is written on it.
Let us see if I can decipher it.
We do not got that kind of time!
W-Wait!
Warning!
The stone guardian will not abide by anyone trying to steal this!
This is why I told you to wait!
Careless blunderer!
You are sayin' this is my fault?!
Yes, it is your fault, Gajeel!
This is no time to argue!
It seems they have activated something.
But this is also according to my calculations.
You...
That is why you separated me from Gajeel and the rest?!
After all, you are strong and can fly, Nii-san.
You are a troublesome opponent, so I had to keep you apart from them.
It looks like that red thing on its head is what controls the rock!
Then that must be its weak point!
Alright!
Time for Shadow Gear to show off some teamwork!
First, we have to get it to stand still!
Solid Script!
Oil!
I am up next!
Chain Plant!
And I will finish it off!
High Speed!
Did you see?
That is Shadow Gear's teamwork!
Not too shabby.
Jet!
Leave it to me!
Are you okay?
The oil is all sticky!
Here it comes!
Let us try this one more time!
Jet!
Crap!
I cannot use High Speed like this!
Then I will give it a try!
I should have gone on a diet...
It looks like I have got to do it...
Get outta the way!
You know, you should not use that tone...
There you go, Nii-san!
Are you an Exceed that was sent to Earthland too?
That is right.
Just like your friends, Happy and Carla.
Then why are you an ally of Legion?
Do not you think you should talk to Happy and Carla, both of whom are in the same circumstances?!
Right after I was born, I was found and raised by Zentopia.
Byro-sama treated me well, too!
More important to me than Exceeds or Edolas
is repaying my obligation to Legion!
Almost there!
Gajeel!
Got To find a way to reach that head...
Gajeel!
This is all working out according to my calculations!
I am going to defeat you, Nii-san!
And that thing is going to dispose of your friends!
After that, the plan is for me to leisurely collect that part.
Crap!
My strength fails me when I got an empty stomach!
That is right!
If I eat this...
What are you talking about?!
Of course you cannot eat that!
Do not be so serious!
I was kiddin'!
That does not sound like a joke, not when you are involved!
Run!
That thing's trying to take the clock face back!
If that is the case...
What are you going to do?!
Go, Gajeel!
What?!
Secret Dragon Slayer Art!
Karma Demon: Iron God Sword!
I took care of this one!
Now hurry up and finish him!
I cannot believe it...
It is impossible!
How can there be someone who does not match my calculations?!
I do not know what to do when things do not go according to plans!
Does not compute!
Does not compute!
Battle is a living thing.
No matter what happens, you have to respond and cope with it.
It seems you still have a lack of experience, Sammy.
Do not call me that!
You are wide open!
You are not a bad fighter.
Try me again sometime.
I will fight whenever you want.
Certainly, I lost.
Now I know that there are some people in the world whose actions I cannot calculate.
You realized you are inexperienced.
I am saying I did not calculate enough before the battle, Nii-san!
I lost today, but next time, I will do more detailed calculations
and then defeat you and your friends, you musclebound cat!
That is right!
I have to make note of all the data from today's battle!
Who you callin' musclebound?!
There are all types of Exceeds, huh?
He called you Nii-san!
I do not remember becoming his big brother!
Look, Nee-chan!
The lake...
Lisanna must have found something.
Good work, Lisanna.
I have not been seen much lately, so I thought I would appeal to the people, you know?
What does that mean?
Well, let us collect this piece and take it back to the guild.
Where did you throw that?!
Huh?
I appreciate your efforts.
Thanks to this, I can just take the part without any trouble.
You are...
You were following us, were not you?!
That is right.
What could be easier than letting you find the part and then snatching it?
I am so smart!
Even though it was Samuel's idea...
You again?!
Give the part back!
Crap!
No matter what you do, the result will be the same.
As long as I have this tact, you are the puppets of Mary Hughes.
I am surprised they do not get tired of that.
I am startin' to get hungry.
You are such a pest!
It is so I can be bound to my soul mate!
What are you talking about, soul mate?!
Before, you said any girl would do!
This may be a silly question...
But if any girl will do, would not Michelle, who is right over there?
Um...
She is a beauty, but I like girls who are spunkier.
True, Lucy is more of a tomboy, right?
You insulted me like it is nothing!
Shall I be punished, Princess?
Lu-nyan!
Wait for me!
Virgo!
What are you here for?!
Come on!
Lu-nyan!
Let us get married!
You looked like you were in trouble, so I thought maybe I could be of service...
Princess?
Then she is the princess of something?!
I see!
That is why she is so beautiful!
What shall I do, Princess?
Actually, there is nothing I really need you to do...
Are you a maid?
Then bring us some food or something, so I can have a good time with the one I love!
I do not have any food prepared, but I could do a fun dance...
That again?!
Anyway, you do not have to listen to what Dan says!
That is a lovely dance!
It reminds me of a traditional dance back in my hometown!
That is the first time anyone has ever complimented me on this dance.
They have got the same taste?!
Both of them are a little bit off, right?
It seems that I have been of service, so I am going to disappear.
Call me anytime.
What did you come out for?!
Dear me.
I came to see what the outcome was...
That voice... Byro-sama!
That stupid octopus!
It appears you have met unexpected difficulties, Dan, Coco.
My apologies, Byro-sama!
Dan Straight is embarrassed to admit this, but he is kind of lost sight of the objective.
Having said that, I happened to come across my soul mate on this holy ground...
Divine retribution?
Both of you leave and contemplate your lack of competence.
That is...
Octopus Man!
That clock hand is Lucy's!
If you do not give it back, I am going to beat the crap outta you!
Yeah, you heard him!
Fine.
Come and get me.
What the hell is with these people?
Going on about holy grounds and stuff...
Sounds like it is probably complicated, huh?
Whatever, I just want'them to start something with me!
We would be better off if everybody was as simple as you.
Is it just me or does that sound not so much like a compliment?
I never said it was a compliment.
Next time: The Whereabouts of the Crusade!
I did not say anything that weird, did I?!
This is my retaliation for not having much to do lately.
I was ready for a fight before, but now I cannot say anything...
